findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Division of decimal numbers can result in rounding errors due to Solidity's implementation.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant to decrease gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow Solidity naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that could cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: L08 - Tautology or Contradiction
findings.description: Using tautologies or contradictions can lead to unintended behavior and harder code maintenance.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is never executed or reached during normal execution.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause a loss of precision.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variable shadowing can lead to confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables without proper checks, which can lead to problems.
